description:
As a new User
              I want to be able to have access to the endabank application
name: User registration

elements.name: The user should be allowed to create a new account

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user clicks on the "create an account" link
the user should be redirected to the Register page

elements.name: The user should complete an successful happy path for a new user

steps.name: the user that has clicked on the "create an account" link in the Login page
the user has been redirected to the Register page
the user enters correct values in all fields
the user clicks on the "Submit" button
the user should see a pop-up with the next information "User registered"

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find content: 'User registered' but never did.

    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (http://medellin-med.uc.r.appspot.com/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\userRegistration.feature:12211:29)
    at Context.eval (http://medellin-med.uc.r.appspot.com/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\userRegistration.feature:11532:35)

elements.name: The user tries to correct fields after writing wrong value

steps.name: the user has been redirected to the Register page
the user has entered a wrong value in a field
an error message should be displayed
the user is correcting value in a field
the error message should dissappear

elements.name: A new User has registered and is awaiting approval

steps.name: the admin user has logged in
the admin user clicks on "Users management"

steps.name: the user is filling the password and confirm password fields
the user writes different values on those fields
